comments.content: the dot is symbolic of "centering", that will be staying the g is a bit weak and I think the longer stem will help. Thanks. ole

Ole,   
   
Fun terminals. They remind me of Bliss.   
   
Stephen

I really enjoy the gentle slope of the R- But that M seems out of place, for some reason. You would almost need to round out the A or Y to match it if you were really married to it. How about trying an M with splayed legs?   
   
The A does seem a little narrow, and I agree with Hrant about the G   
   
I'd love to see another post, should you decide to revise any of these-

Maybe do something more with the dot?   
And I'd give the "G" a stronger stem.   
   
hhp
